lines.text: What would I do with your balls, were they mine? Would I hang them by their shorthairs from my long painted nails? And crack a grin as they dropped, splat splat, on the floor? No, I wouldn't do that with your balls, were they mine. But I'd put them instead in some sort of shrine. I'd fondle them daily, and keep them in line, and give them a licking from time to time. Yes, that's what I'd do with your balls, were they mine.
Man, I never met anybody who did crime for a living. I mean I had a cousin once who held up a gas station on his bicycle, but he was nuts.
Runs in the family, huh?
Hey, you with some kind of organization?
Yeah, uh, Northwest Homeowners Association.

[while robbing the safe]
Hey, where'd you get that apple?
Out there.
Next time you want an apple, you buy it!
More guys blow their careers 'cause they can't control their bad habits.
So, you're an actress?
Well, I'm an actress and a model.
Yeah? Done any movies?
I'm not at the performance level just yet. I'm still developing my instrument.
Oh, so you're a musician too, huh?

[doing knee bends]
The knees are the second thing to go.
What's the first?
I can't remember.
Do you have a family?
No, not really. Just a mother, and a father, and a sister.

[wheeling in bogus machine]
It's gonna be about 15 minutes. After we leave, that's when the roaches die.
We don't have any roaches.
See, we were here about 2 years ago.

[parting]
Poor kid.
Poor old guy.
